channel.title: spaCy on Agus site
channel.description: Recent content in spaCy on Agus site

item.title: A NER Model for Command Line Help Messages (Part 1: The console program)
item.description: In this 3 part series I will tell the journey of creating a program to detect the different components/entities of a command line program’s help message. This post will start by looking at the final product, helpner, a python program that can be installed from PyPI, the second will tell about the spaCy NLP workflow and finally we will take a look at the data that feeds spaCy. The post assumes some python knowledge, like how to install a library from PyPI, and some familiarity with spaCy.
